steps.title: Cute messages
steps.content: Cute messages Use endearing terms to greet her, let her know you're excited to see her soon, ask about how she's doing, and remind her that you absolutely adore her. “Good morning, pumpkin! How did you sleep last night? I woke up with a smile on my face… just the thought of you brightens my day! I just wanted to take a moment to wish you a wonderful week.” “Rise and shine, gorgeous. Did you get enough sleep? I hope that you enjoy your day, darling, and I can't wait to see you this weekend!” “Morning, cutie. How are you feeling after last night? I woke up thinking about you and wanted to wish you a great day. Love you lots, and I hope the rest of your day is as radiant as you are!”

steps.title: Romantic messages
steps.content: Romantic messages Tell her how much you appreciate her and explain how special she is to you. Earn bonus points by describing how she makes you feel; you can even feel free to write a little poem if you feel inspired! “Thank you for being such an amazing girlfriend. You make me laugh and smile, but more importantly, you make me want to be the best version of myself. I’m the luckiest person in the world to be your partner.” “You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me… Seriously, what did I do to deserve you? I didn’t believe in soulmates until I met you… I feel like the happiest person in the world when I’m with you.” “I wake up feeling like I won the lottery because of you. Seriously, I can’t wait until I come home… you’re the best part of my entire day.” “My alarm can go off multiple times, but my day doesn’t start until I hear your voice. You make everything better, and I love you dearly!” “Roses are red, violets are blue. The only thing sweeter than sleep is you. Seriously, though—you mean the world to me. You're the light of my life, and I can't imagine my world without you!”

steps.title: Flirty messages
steps.content: Flirty messages Get her heart racing with a sultry morning text. You might describe a hot dream you had, let her know what you're thinking about, or explain that you miss being close to her. This'll make her feel totally wanted by you! “I had the most amazing dream last night. You were there, things got pretty spicy. Anyway, hope you spend the day thinking of me… I’ll definitely be thinking of you." “I hope you spend the day thinking of me. I have a big meeting today, but I can’t focus… I’m too distracted thinking about you.” “My bed feels a little empty, want to come over and cuddle? Honestly, you should just move in at this point… texting you good morning isn’t cutting it for me...” “I miss seeing your beautiful face so much. Show me what you’re wearing to work? I'd love to see your cute self.”

steps.title: Supportive messages
steps.content: Supportive messages Let her know that you want the best for her, and you're her ride of ride. Ease her anxieties, make sure she remembers how great she is, and let her know that you're there for her, no matter what. You might also congratulate her on a recent win or use an inspiring quote! “I know you’re nervous about your project, but take a deep breath and try to stay calm. You’re the most intelligent and hard-working person I’ve ever met, and you're absolutely crushing it! I’m here for you, and we can get through this together.” “It’s the big day… and I can already confirm that you’re going to be amazing. I know you’re stressing out about the event, but I promise that everything’s going to be okay! Remember—we’re a team, and I got you.” “Congratulations on the promotion! And good luck at the office today Ms. Editor-in-Chief. Just wanted to remind you that you can achieve anything you set your mind to. I believe in you!”

steps.title: Long-distance relationship messages
steps.content: Long-distance relationship messages If you're far away from your GF, good morning messages are a great way to stay close. Make sure to stress how much you miss her, let her know when something reminds you of her, and talk about how excited you are to see her soon. “Woke up thinking about you, my love. My bed is really cold without you by my side. I’m feeling so blue without you... I miss you like crazy!” “I woke up to the most gorgeous sunrise, and it made me think of you. I snapped a pic—let me know what you think!” “Counting down the days until I get to see you again! I miss everything about you… especially your morning hair. And your hugs. I could really use one right now!” “How’s your family? I saw the photos you posted and the reunion looked like a blast. They made me miss you a little extra today… I can’t wait until I get to see your beautiful face.”

steps.title: Funny messages
steps.content: Funny messages Get your girl laughing first thing in the morning! Ask silly questions, throw in a silly movie/meme reference, or use emojis to give your message a silly vibe: “Good morning, starshine… the earth says hello! You’re going to achieve great things today… unless you’re still asleep.” “Good morning, baby… don’t fall asleep after reading this text! T minus 15 hours until we can get back to bed.” “Top o’ the morning, govna! You know what they say—the best part of waking up… is getting to sleep in 16 hours.” “What do lobsters drink in the morning? Claw-fee! How do skeletons like their eggs? Terri-fried! You'd better get up and at 'em, or you'll be in for more punny surprises.”

steps.title: Friendly messages
steps.content: Friendly messages Maybe your girlfriend is more relaxed. She doesn't want flirty or romantic messages first thing in the morning, she just wants to know you're thinking of her. Try one of these casual messages instead: “Morning! What was the name of the coffee shop you mentioned the other day? I'd love to check it out with you sometime.” “Good morning! I hope your day is full of smiles. Though, I gotta be honest... I still can’t get over what you said yesterday. How is Shrek better than Shrek 2?!” “Just remembered the time we almost broke the copier at your first job😂 I hope you don’t get into too much trouble today!”

steps.title: Reflect on her personality to craft a message that's perfect for her.
steps.content: Reflect on her personality to craft a message that's perfect for her. Does your girlfriend cry easily? Does she adore compliments? Is she a full-on romantic, or is she more laid back? Think about your partner’s interests and attachment style, then tailor your message to make her feel even more moved. Use these tips if you want to do more than just a standard copy-and-paste message: Compliment her outfit if she’s into fashion: “You looked really good in that dress last night. How is it possible for you to look so gorgeous in everything you wear? You always manage to take my breath away.” Include an energizing song if she’s all about music: Try “ENERGY” by Beyoncé with the message, "Thought you could use a little pick-me-up this morning... I know I could use the extra boost! What kinds of songs have you been jamming out to recently? I'd love to get my hands on your playlist." Include a date suggestion if quality time is her love language: “What’s on your schedule today? I want to take you out to lunch if you’re free! There's this coffee shop near my place that I think you'll really dig.” Surprise her with breakfast if food's the way to her heart: “There may or may not be donuts waiting for you in the kitchen. Don't take the cruller, though! If that tasty treat is missing when I come back, there will be war.” Send her a daily horoscope if she’s into astrology: “Starting today, Libras are going to experience a period of inner transformation… Can you feel it? I may need your help figuring out my horoscope, though. I'm totally lost!”

steps.title: Incorporate thoughtful details to personalize your message.
steps.content: Incorporate thoughtful details to personalize your message. To create a unique message that makes your partner smile, look back on your favorite memories with her. Try to add small snippets of previous conversations to show that you care about her, or get creative and find a way to surprise her. Not sure what to do? Here are a few personalization tips to help you get started: Mention something she said earlier in conversation: “I was thinking about what you said about the moon yesterday, because I thought it was so beautiful. Every time I look at the moon now, I never fail to think of you.” Send a candid photo of her that she didn’t know you took: “This photo makes me smile, because you look more beautiful studying than most people do on their best day. I could honestly stare at this picture of you all day...” Spell out exactly what you love about her: “I had a friend ask about my new girlfriend yesterday. Wanna guess what I told them? I said she’s nuts about soccer, she’s got gorgeous brown eyes, and she’s the strongest person I’ve ever met.” Mention concrete details about her life to show that you know her: "Sometimes I just think about how lucky I am that your family moved from Reno to Boston. Imagine if we'd never met? I thank my lucky stars every day that you fell into my life."
